title: Create a decent output paging utility because more.com just doesn't cut it
body: more.com is probably the lamest output pager in existing (well other than type).  :-)  Please create a decent output pager that supports paging up/down and moving up/down a line at a time.  Even some basic find support would be nice.  I've used less394 and like it.  It might be a bit too powerful but something along those lines would be a massive improvement over more.com.

comments.body:
GNU less is an awesome and beloved tool which is widely used on macOS/Linux/POSIX:
http://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man1/less.1.html
https://www.gnu.org/software/less/
